summary: Valdimar no longer attacks you in beast form.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple fix for something that annoyed me and figured others might like it. Valdimar (Morthal Housecarl) will no longer attack you while you're in beast form.

Requires Dawnguard (so he doesn't wail on the totems), Hearthfire (obviously) and the latest update.

Compatible (and tested) with:
UFO
Tales of Lycanthropy
Heart of the Beast
Werewolf Followers

Have fun and let me know if you want this done to more followers/housecarls because it is SEVERELY ANNOYING to beast out only to have your followers smash your face in. :)
author: Knayru
